title: Restaurant 8ablish
typeOfFood: Vegan, Italian, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Vegan restaurant opened Sept 2015 by Purecafe which also opened the 8ablish Cafe in Meguro-ku. This location serves Italian and Mediterranean cuisine and organic drinks. Sells vegan ice cream takeaway. Has English menu. Short walk from Omotesando station Exit B1.
